title: Child Modeling Career After Parents Career

content.question: Shamir wants to be a doctor like both of his parents when he gets older. He never thought of doing anything else. Which of the following best explains Shamirâ€™s decision?

choices.label: He has not fully developed his identity.
His parents have a permissive parenting style, which has left him with an underdeveloped identity.
He is in a moratorium state of identity.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
